    Scribbles 3D Games Mixed Media Music Blog
     Had a bit of downtime between work and family/friends business yesterday and today.  I've been tossing around the idea of a new game with a couple friends of mine or a little while and after I saw a few example pixel arts from them I decided it was time to stop talking and start doing.  After about an hour of reinstalling, googling, coding, and animating I ended up with this:




     It's not much more than a proof of concept.  I like the idea of doing a 2.5D game, composed of great pixel art, though, as I've never spent any time doing pixel art it'll be a challenge to keep a consistent aesthetic!  Should be fun!  For now I have no idea how it's all going to expand out - looks like we'll just figure it out as we go along.  The main character is Leonard:




With his trusty sidekick/villain/whatever-role-I-decide-to-assign-yet-to-be-named-penguin:
